lead_paragraph: TEAM In Argentina, Arsenal played the final 45 minutes with only nine men, but managed to snatch a 3-3 tie with last-place Gimnasia when goalkeeper Mario Cuenca scored on a penalty kick in the final minute. Arsenal’s Darío Espínola and Aníbal Matellán had been ejected in the first half.
